price: 22 « Allons très tôt à notre verger, si nous voulons en récolter les fruits. »
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
